cookies.errorSignatureDesc: Failed to load the signature, please try again.

emptyTable.title: No documents to be displayed
emptyTable.description: Your Inbox is empty. Once you receive documents, they will be displayed here.

signatureModal.title: Add signature
signatureModal.errorMessage: Your signature has not been saved, please try again

emptyTable.title: No documents
emptyTable.description: No documents have been created yet. Once you create documents, they will be displayed here.

signFailed.title: Oops! Something went wrong
signFailed.description: Failed to load the document, please try again

allDone.title: You are all done!
allDone.description: The sender will be notified and you will receive a copy once everyone completes signing.

completedDocument.title: You've completed the document
completedDocument.description: The document has been signed successfully by your end and the sender will be notified.

declinedDocument.title: You've declined to sign
declinedDocument.description: You declined signing the agreement and the sender will be notified. If you have any questions, please contact the sender.

documentNotFound.title: Document doesn't exist
documentNotFound.description: This document is no longer available. Please contact the sender if you need further assistance.

expiredLink.title: Link expired
expiredLink.description: The link has expired to keep your document safe. Request for a new link by clicking the 'Send new link' button to receive a new link.

sessionExpired.title: Your session has expired
sessionExpired.description: For security reasons, your session has expired. Please access your session again clicking the button in the email.

updatedLink.title: Updated Link is on the way
updatedLink.description: We've sent you a new link. Please check your inbox and use the updated link to continue.

documentNotFoundLink.title: Something went wrong
documentNotFoundLink.description: Failed to load document. Please try again later or contact the sender for assistance.

dateFormat.title: Date format
dateFormat.description: Define the standard date format, which will automatically reflect in documents

expirations.title: Expirations
expirations.defaultExpDescription: Specify the number of days until the documents expires by default
expirations.warnDescription: Specify the number of days before expiration to warn signer

toastContent.errorMessage: Failed to save changes. Please try again

create.title: Create Document

create.createFailToastTitle: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
create.emailSubjectLimitError: The title can only have {{limit}} characters, please update the title.

fileTypeNotSupported.title: File type not supported
fileTypeNotSupported.description: The uploaded file type is not supported. Please try again.
fileTypeNotSupported.validationMessage: Invalid file type. Please upload a .pdf file

fileTooLarge.title: Allowed file size exceeded
fileTooLarge.description: The file size should be less than 25 MB. Please try again.
fileTooLarge.validationMessage: Max file size exceeded. Please upload a file less than 25 MB

uploadFailed.title: Oops! Something went wrong
uploadFailed.description: Failed to upload the document. Please try again.

recipientDetails.disabledTooltip: You can only add up to 50 recipients per one document

newRecipientModal.name: Name

recipientDetails.recipientNotInContacts: This recipient is not in contacts

reminderFrequency.label: Reminder Frequency (Days)
reminderFrequency.tooltip: Set a reminder frequency to send reminders to signers.

expirationDate.label: Expiration Date
expirationDate.tooltip: Set a custom expiration date for the document.

externalConfirmation.title: Are you sure?
externalConfirmation.infoSubtitle: The document recipients contain external users.
externalConfirmation.description: Do you wish to confirm & send the document to all the internal & external recipients?

internalConfirmation.title: Are you sure?
internalConfirmation.description: You are about to send your document to the recipients. Do you wish to confirm & send the document or cancel?

summary.emailMessageLimitError: Messages can’t be longer than {{limit}} characters.

modals.deleteDocumentDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this uploaded document? You will not be able to revoke this decision.

voidEnvelopeModal.title: Are you sure?

description.part3: this document. This action cannot be revoked. Do you wish to void anyway?

voidEnvelopeModal.successMessage: The document has been voided successfully
voidEnvelopeModal.errorMessage: Failed to void the document. Please try again
voidEnvelopeModal.characterLimitExceeded: Character limit of 255 has been exceeded

transferOwnership.successMessage: The ownership has been transferred successfully.
transferOwnership.errorMessage: Failed to transfer the ownership. Please try again.

contact.title: Contacts

emptySearchResult.title: No results found
emptySearchResult.description: We couldn't find any matches for your search. Please try using a different term.

emptyFilterResult.title: No results found
emptyFilterResult.description: We couldn't find any matches for your search. Please adjust your filter criteria and try again

emptyContactData.title: No Contact data yet!
emptyContactData.description: Please proceed to add Contact data. Then you can see their details here!

concentModal.consentFailedDesc: Failed to start signing the document.
concentModal.agreeText: I agree to use electronic records and signatures.
concentModal.description: By clicking on the Start button, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the terms of this document. You agree to sign this document electronically acknowledging your intent to proceed with the process using digital means and to recognize the contents of the document as reviewed and received.

toast.declineErrorDesc: Failed to decline signing. Please try again
toast.failedToSignDocumentDesc: Failed to sign the document. Please try again.
toast.alreadyDeclinedDesc: The envelope has been declined by a recipient.

sessionWarning.title: Session Expiring Soon
sessionWarning.description: Your session will expire in 2 minutes due to inactivity.

adoptSign.fileSizeError: The uploaded stamp exceeds the allowed file size of 5MB. Please try again

cancel.text: You are about to leave your current task, and any unsaved changes will be lost. Do you wish to resume your task or leave anyway?

decline.text: You are about to decline signing the document.
decline.errorText: Declining reason can’t be longer than 500 characters.

info.title: Sign, Manage, Succeed With Skapp E-Signature
info.description: Effortless E-Signatures and more. Sign securely and manage People, Time, and Projects all with Skapp.

envelopeLimitReached.title: Envelope Limit Has Been Reached
envelopeLimitReached.descriptionAdminFreeTier: Your current plan includes only 5 envelopes per year. Please upgrade to Skapp Core to create more envelopes.
envelopeLimitReached.descriptionNonAdminFreeTier: Your current plan includes only 5 envelopes per year. Please contact your organization's super admin.
envelopeLimitReached.descriptionNonAdminProTier: Your organization has reached the envelope limit. Please contact your organization's super admin.
envelopeLimitReached.descriptionProTier: Your organization has reached the envelope limit. Please contact us for more information.

nudgeSuccess.description: The recipient has been nudged successfully!
